result.title: Prototype of the INCISION Academy 1.1
result.description:
Prototype of the INCISION Academy 1.1 with the following extra features over the 1.0 version: - Teacher - Student communication applications - Student - Student communcation applications - 200 modules online (from WP2/3)
We will provide a deliverable report to the EC and enable online demonstration.
This deliverable is related to Task 5.3.

result.title: Manufacturing asset/service description languages
result.description:
Manufacturing asset/service description languages for supporting semi-automatic generating manufacturing asset description; clustering manufacturing assets from unstructured and semi-structured enterprise resources; dynamic discovery of manufacturing assets; composition in advanced applications in the domains of manufacturing, and on-the-fly process verification.
Task T2.1(M3-M6) Establish the requirements of a manufacturing asset service description languages Task T2.2 (M3-M12) Design the manufacturing asset service description languages
A draft version is envisioned for month 24, which will be updated to reflect incremental changes driven by the other working packages for month 48 (deliverable 7.5).
